title: Research History
description: Historical log of research refresh events and their source data for a feature.

feature_id.description: Unique slug for the feature or product that the research applies to.

generated_at.description: Timestamp when this research history file was generated.

entries.description: Chronological list of research refresh events that analysts can reference before running new studies.

recorded_at.description: When this research snapshot or finding was captured.

data_source.description: Metadata about where the research insight originated.

name.description: Human-readable name of the data source, report, or interviewee group.

uri.description: Link to the source document or dataset when available.

notes.description: Additional context about how the data was collected or prepared.

summary.description: Key findings or themes captured during this research event.

valid_from.description: Timestamp when the findings became reliable or applicable.

valid_until.description: Optional timestamp that bounds when the findings stop being reliable. Leave null when still valid.

confidence.description: Subjective confidence rating for this research snapshot.

tags.description: Searchable keywords that help analysts locate related research quickly.
